p: The identification of the chemical compounds present in the essential oil was made from the comparisons of the Linear Indices of Retention (LRI) and Kovats (KI) of the homologous series of n-alkanes (C8â€“C26) and the literature [ 15, 16]. In addition to the identification made by combining the spectra obtained by the analysis performed on the equipment and the mass spectra of the software library Labsolutions GC-MS solution version 2.50 SU1.
